title: Microsoft Events Are Going All Digital - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.07.20
description:
Blessing and Imran discuss what digital-only events mean for Microsoft, a new No Man's Sky update, and the answer to the Cooking Mama mystery.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You Shirt  kindafunny.com/store
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:00 - No Man’s Sky has fucking mechs now - Matt Wales @ Eurogamer
00:12:45 - Japanese ratings board stops assigning ratings - Brendan Sinclair @ GIBiz
00:15:38 - What exactly is involved with reviewing a game to give it a rating? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:24:12 - The Cooking Mama mystery has been solved? - CHRISTOPHER TEUTON @ Screen Rant
00:33:00 - That E3 Online Event is not happening - Andy Chalk @ PCGamer
00:35:40 - All Microsoft events will be "digital-first" until August 2021 - James Batchelor @ GIBiz
00:40:00 - There’s a new Inside Xbox happening today -  Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:45:12 -  Manscaped
00:48:06 - Sony Automatically Issuing Refunds For The Last Of Us Part 2 And Iron Man VR - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:48:53 - Sony is automatically refunding preorders for both the Last of Us Part 2 and Iron Man VR. I'm wondering why they don't leave it as an optional choice instead of making it automatic. - Best Friends Q: Frankfurtter
00:51:33 - Mafia 2 And Mafia 3 Definitive Editions have been Listed By Ratings Board - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:55:00 - Chrono Trigger Composer Yasunori Mitsuda Will Contribute Music to Sabotage’s Upcoming RPG Sea of Stars, PRESS RELEASE
00:58:20 - Out today
01:00:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Greg and Gary
